description: This file defines the root layout component for a Remix-run web application, including link setup for styles and fonts, and the main app structure rendering outlet content.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external links and resources such as fonts and stylesheets for the app.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component that provides the overall HTML structure including head metadata and body layout.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component rendering the outlet for nested routes.
